sentences.sContent: Little by little, he formulated his plan for escape.
sentences.sCn: 他一点一点地构想出了他的逃跑计划。

sentences.sContent: We are studying the situation but have not formulated any response yet.
sentences.sCn: 我们正在研究形势，但尚未考虑好如何回应。

synos.tran: 规划；用公式表示；明确地表达

words.tran: 公式化的；刻板的；套话堆砌的
[数] 公式，准则；配方；婴儿食品
构想，规划；公式化；简洁陈述
公式集；处方一览表；套话

trans.tranCn: 规划；制定；准备；仔细思考并明确表达
trans.tranOther: to develop something such as a plan or a set of rules, and decide all the details of how it will be done
